text: To further define transcriptional programs that might specify pulmonary myocardium identity , we performed transcription factor binding site enrichment analysis . We used the oPOSSUM - 3 Web - based tool ( Kwon et al . 2012 ) to identify overrepresented , conserved transcription factor binding sites in our set of 21 pulmonary myocardium genes and five candidate modifier genes .
